description: This file is a BitBake include file (.inc) primarily used for defining and configuring the MariaDB package within the Yocto/OpenEmbedded build system. It contains metadata, source URLs, patches, build instructions, package configurations, and installation procedures specific to building MariaDB, a scalable SQL server.

methods.name: do_configure
methods.description: Applies configuration patches and edits to setup build scripts properly for different distributions.

methods.name: do_generate_toolchain_file
methods.description: Generates a custom QEMU wrapper for cross-compilation support.

methods.name: do_install
methods.description: Defines the steps to install MariaDB components, including configuration files, systemd units, init scripts, and documentation.

methods.name: mariadb_sysroot_preprocess
methods.description: Adjusts mysql_config to refer to the correct include and library directories within the sysroot.
